mapper.insert: insert ignore into posts(post_title, block_id, poster_id) values (#{postTitle}, #{blockId}, #{posterId})
mapper.select: select post_id, post_title, block_id, blocks.block_name as block_name, poster_id, users.user_name as poster_name, poster_time, last_comment_time, comments_count, is_fine, is_top from posts where block_id = #{blockId} left join blocks on posts.block_id = blocks.block_id left join users on posts.poster_id = user_id
